DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy sleep quality food supplement .
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer age 25 65 year Patient diagnose primary Insomnia ( threshold inclusion : 10 ISI scale ) Healthy volunteer without diurnal sleep ( total score inclusion must less 10 Epworth scale ) Patient affiliate French Social Security Patient give write informed consent Secondary insomnia History severe psychiatric disorder , assess MINI test Resistance Hypnotic drug Anxiety , depression , suicide , detect Beck Depression Inventory Acute Pathology precedent three year Breast feeding pregnancy woman Non compliant volunteer Hypersensibility treatment composant
